properties.description:
This invokes 4 other pipelines.
1. Ingest Data from ADLS blob locations to Snowflake Stage tables. 
2. Transform the data from Snowflake Stage Tables and load to the final base tables.
3. To check the presence of dependent triggers.
4. To delete the triggers after processing.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Until-TriggerFound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed05
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Until-TriggerFound
activities.description: This activity will invoked EP-UntilTriggerFound which will wait and search for the presence of dependent triggers.

activities.name: IF_Dependent_Trigger_Exists
activities.description: Checks whether Dependant Entry is Existing

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess07
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_Dependent_Trigger_Exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IS_Metadata_Valid activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

value.value: Orchestration metadata retrived zero valid records
Orchestration metadata retrived zero valid records

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to application_name and blob_trigger_name from orchestration_metadata.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT md.*,
CASE WHEN (ISNULL(UPPER(stage_table_name),'') NOT IN ('DUMMY','','NULL')) AND ISNULL(UPPER(dbt_exec_mode),'') NOT IN ('','NULL','DUMMY') THEN 'SFK_DBT'
WHEN (ISNULL(UPPER(stage_table_name),'') IN ('DUMMY','','NULL')) AND ISNULL(UPPER(dbt_exec_mode),'') NOT IN ('','NULL','DUMMY') THEN 'DBT'
WHEN (ISNULL(UPPER(stage_table_name),'') NOT IN ('DUMMY','','NULL')) AND ISNULL(UPPER(dbt_exec_mode),'') IN ('','NULL','DUMMY') THEN 'SFK' 
ELSE 'FAIL' END AS load_type
FROM khc_orchestration_metadata md WHERE blob_trigger_name='@{concat(substring(pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerPathName,add(indexof(pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerPathName,'/'),1),sub(length(pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerPathName),add(indexof(pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerPathName,'/'),1))),'/',pipeline().parameters.BlobTriggerName)}' AND active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: EP-DeleteTriggers
activities.description: This activity will  invoke pipeline EP-DeleteTriggers which will delete parent and dependent triggers.

activities.name: IF_SnowflakeIngestion
activities.description:
Invokes Snowflake Ingestion based on the if LoadType = 'SFK'
else proceeds further without Snowflake Ingestion.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess06
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of EP-SnowflakeIngestion activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: IS_Metadata_Valid
activities.description: Checks whether the  Input combination given to Pipeline is valid or not.

else proceeds further without Snowflake Ingestion.
